Subroutine ck_success

476 : 
477 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
478 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
479 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
480 : 
481 :       subroutine ck_success ()
482 :       use sce_mod
483 :       implicit none
484 : 
485 :       call optsensitivity()
486 :       if (success .eq. 1) then
487 :         call sortcomp(shufflevar(:,:), shape(shufflevar(:,:)), ofvec(:), size(ofvec(:)))  ! [SORT ENTIRE ARRAYS]
488 :         call writepars
489 :         write(*,'(/"Optimisation completed successfully."/)')
490 :         write(kfile_progress,'(/"Optimisation completed successfully."/)')
491 :         print *,char(7)
492 :         print *,char(7)
493 :         print *,char(7)
494 :         close(kfile_sceout)
495 :         close(kfile_bestpars)
496 :         close(kfile_progress)
497 :       else
498 :         call sortcomp(shufflevar(:,:), shape(shufflevar(:,:)), ofvec(:), size(ofvec(:)))  ! [SORT ENTIRE ARRAYS]
499 :         call writepars
500 :         nsincebest = 0
501 :         write(kfile_bestpars,outformat) shufflevar(:,1), bestobj
502 :       endif
503 : 
504 :       return
505 :       end subroutine ck_success
